title: How Deregulation Can Increase Economic Growth – The White House
content:
Economy & Jobs	

October 2, 2017
4 minute readCouncil of Economic AdvisersIt is making us less competitive:It is costly, with much of the burden falling on small businesses and entrepreneurs:It perpetuates inequality, hurting the most vulnerable the hardest:Occupational licensing can be a form of regulation that creates barriers to entry and makes workers less mobile:This taxation-by-regulation has increased sharply in recent years: The Administration’s continued deregulatory policies will drive continued economic growth:You can read the full report here.
